faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our game server hosting services
faq.question1: How do I get started with game server hosting?
faq.answer1: Getting started is simple! Choose your game, select a server location, and follow our easy setup wizard. Your server will be up and running in minutes with our instant deployment system.
faq.question2: What kind of support do you provide?
faq.answer2: We offer 24/7 technical support through live chat and ticket system. Our expert team is always ready to help with server configuration, performance optimization, and any technical issues.
faq.question3: Can I modify server settings and configurations?
faq.answer3: Yes! You have full control over your server settings through our intuitive control panel. Modify game settings, install mods, and manage your server with ease.
faq.question4: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer4: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and cryptocurrency payments. Our billing system is secure and transparent, with no hidden fees.
faq.answer5: Yes, all our servers come with enterprise-grade DDoS protection included at no extra cost. Your server will stay online even during attacks.
